arStrings.szText:
Provides the opportunity for caches of {c_legendary}Legendary{/c} items with {c_important}Defensive Aspects{/c} to be offered during{icon:Marker_Bartering, 2.4}{c_important}Bartering{/c}. 

{c_label}Bartering:{/c} This will go into effect on the Fayira's next new stock delivery. It does not guarantee stock of these items. The more difficult the item is to obtain, the less likely it will be offered.

{c_label}Aspects:{/c} {icon:Crafting_Blacksmith_SalvageItems, 1.8} {c_important}Salvage{/c} items to add or upgrade Aspects in your {c_important}Codex of Power{/c}.
